about_the_game:
FOXYBALL

A Boutique Leisure Game

Note:

We realized that the atmosphere in the gameplay are somewhat underwhelming, we are committed to improving the player experience and will continue to release free major updates to address these shortcomings. We kindly ask for your patience as this is part of a long-term vision.

Thank you for your trust and support!

FOXYBALL is a fun and easy-to-play game inspired by Football Penalty. Instead of playing against a goalkeeper, the goal is divided into 24 blocks, with a new random configuration for each attempt. To score, players will need a combination of luck, skill, and smart decision-making.

We created FOXYBALL to be a simple, relaxing experience—quick to learn, easy to play, and perfect for unwinding. It recaptures the charm and joy of the games we grew up with back in the 1990s and early 2000s, where players could jump right in and start having fun.. 

FOXYBALL is about instant fun and relaxation. The game offers 4 distinct play modes within:

- “Starlink” and “Sweeper” are ideal for solo play, offering the perfect way to relax while challenging yourself to higher score.

- “Teamgeist” mode encourages teamwork, as you and your friends or family join forces to solve tricky challenges together.

- “Jackpot” mode offers a competitive and friendly battle where lets players face off in a tactical showdown.

FOXYBALL is an entertainment that fits any occasion—from solo play to family day or social events. 

We recommend the “Starlink” and “Sweeper” modes for those looking to unwind or enjoy some solo time such as during a cozy weekend afternoon. If you have a STEAM DECK, these modes are perfect companions for your daily commute or longer journeys.

For a more social experience, please do try the “Teamgeist” and “Jackpot” modes. They’re perfect for introducing your children to the joys of both football and gaming, bringing fun and laughter to family time, or sharing sweet, playful moments with your mates or loved one.
detailed_description:
Foxyball Development Blueprint

As a small, independent studio of 4 passionate developers, we are proud to present this debut version of FOXYBALL on STEAM. Looking ahead, we remain dedicated to enhancing the gameplay experience through sustained free updates, as well as we are excited to continue our work on future development, including an ONLINE MULTIPLAYER version and a BODY-MOTION version, which we believe will offer the most immersive FOXYBALL experience yet.

Furthermore, we are actively exploring the possibility of bringing Foxyball to multi-platforms, such as the Switch 2 and Apple Glasses. We will do our best to serve our players by creating experiences that offer more dynamic, immersive, and entertaining gameplay, along with even more engaging and humorous interactions with others.

We are game creators, and players, too! We firmly believe that the true value of games lies in offering relief and escape from the exhaustion and pressures of daily life—not in burdening players with repetitive, time-consuming tasks. Our goal is to create an experience where players can carve out a little space away from the stresses of work and life, returning to the pure, unfiltered joy of gaming—fun in its truest form.

If our game resonates with you, or if you have any feedback or suggestions, we would be most grateful if you followed us on Twitter/X: @HayenGames

Thank you sincerely for your interest and support.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: FOXYBALL is much more than a football penalty simulator, no goalkeeper, and players challenge some naughty tricky goals, demanding luck, skill, and smart decision-making. It includes 4 unique modes to fit different occasions: for your leisure time, gaming with your loved one, family day, and party.
